data.feedback: Comprehensive plan covering all 9 user requirements. Correctly identifies existing files (DioClient, Validators, AppConfig, ApiEndpoints). Backend API routes exist and are properly documented. Clean architecture with proper layer separation. WebSocket events match backend types.

issues.description: Platform config creates .health suffix files instead of modifying originals

suggestions: Consider adding fl_chart package to pubspec.yaml in epic-dashboard story
Consider adding health and workmanager packages to epic-native-integration dependencies
